Sean Evans

Interviews with a hell-hot, delish twist.





Timeline


  • 1986 - Date of Birth
  • 2008 - Graduated from the University of Illinois at Urbana–Champaign in 2008 with a Bachelor of Arts degree in broadcast journalism
  • 2014 - Started freelancing for Complex Magazine in NO, doing interviews and posting on their YouTube channel, especially with famous celebrities such as 2 Chainz and Steph Curry
  • 2014 - Quit his current job and started a career at Complex
  • 2015 - The YouTube channel and show "Hot Ones" was founded by Chris Schonberg, with Sean Evans as host on Season 1 & 2
  • 2016 - Finale / Last episode of Hot Ones, Season 2
  • 2017 - Release of Hot Ones, Season 3 & 4
  • 2017 - The Hot Ones iconic, signature sauce, "The Last Dab", is launched on this date
  • 2018 - Release of Hot Ones, Season 5, followed by the launch of "The Last Dab Reduxx"
  • 2019 - Release of Hot Ones, Season 10, followed by the surprising launch of a twisted upgrade, "The Last Dab XXX"
  • 2020 - Release of Hot Ones, Season 11, now going virtual due to the ongoing pandemic
  • 2021 - Release of Hot Ones, Season 14, still virtual - but you're all caught up !


" If you think scrawling your Twitter handle on a bus window with a Sharpie is a worthwhile way to gain followers, your social media strategy is headed in a pretty pathetic direction. "

--- Sean Evans, First We Feast



An interesting guy and a great show host. Read more about him at : Sean Evans or This link .
